# CSS Images

## Embedded as Base64

```css
.DownArrowMax {display:inline-block;background:url(data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAABAAAAAQCAMAAAAoLQ9TAAAAFVBMVEX///9wcHBwcHBwcHBwcHBwcHBwcHA3RenHAAAAB3RSTlMAEYi7zN3/VyoyVQAAAD1JREFUeNqNyNEKACAIQ9Fmc///ySVUUkF08cGd8p37AdILjAgAbQBVIYHigHjVjygpvdgpc6ds+0yrG35qltUBSh0GXHoAAAAASUVORK5CYII=) no-repeat left center; }

.SmallUpTriangle {background-image:url(data:image/png;base64,);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:right 50%; }

.SmallDownTriangle{background-image:url(data:image/png;base64,);background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:right 50%; }
```
